item.title: Godsword specials, help
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

specialDamage = 45 + misc.random(45);

Change the 45… the the random 45 is randomly hitting another up to 45
So you can randomly max a 90 if you’re lucky atm… So i would make it like 50, random 20, so you can hit 70.

Read full topic

item.title: Godsword specials, help
item.dc:creator: @red_rooster red_rooster
item.description:
@red_rooster wrote:

this is the code i have for my npc’s. i fdigured it would work for pvp also. can someone creteak this or give me a code that will make the godsword specials hit higher.

					if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15334 && specialAmount <= 99) {//godsword bgs
					specialDamage = 0;
					specialDamage2 = 0;
					sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy left.");
					}
					if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15334 && specialAmount >= 100) {//godsword bgs
					animation(590, EnemyY, EnemyX);
					startAnimation(2890);
					specialDamage = 45 + misc.random(45);
					specialAmount -= 100;
					hitDiff = 45 + misc.random(45);
					}
					if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15335 && specialAmount <= 99) {//godsword sgs
					specialDamage = 0;
					specialDamage2 = 0;
					sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy left.");
					}
					if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15335 && specialAmount >= 100) {//godsword sgs
					animation(611, EnemyY, EnemyX);
					startAnimation(2890);
					specialDamage = 35 + misc.random(35);
					specialAmount -= 100;
					hitDiff = 35 + misc.random(35);
					NewHP += hitDiff;
					if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) {
					NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
					}
					}
					if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15333 && specialAmount <= 49) {//godsword ags
					specialDamage = 0;
					specialDamage2 = 0;
					sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy left.");
					}
					if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15333 && specialAmount >= 50) {//godsword ags
					animation(651, EnemyY, EnemyX);
					startAnimation(2890);
					specialDamage = 40 + misc.random(40);
					specialAmount -= 50;
					hitDiff = 40 + misc.random(40);
					}
					if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15336 && specialAmount <= 99) {//godsword zgs
					specialDamage = 0;
					specialDamage2 = 0;
					sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy left.");
					}
					if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15336 && specialAmount >= 100) {//godsword zgs
					animation(369, EnemyY, EnemyX);
					animation(592, EnemyY, EnemyX);
					startAnimation(2890);
					specialDamage = 35 + misc.random(35);
					specialAmount -= 100;
					hitDiff = 35 + misc.random(35);
					}

~red_rooster

Read full topic
